call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Community Chat - September 4th

topics.title: Community AMA Format Introduction
topics.summary: Introduction to the first official community AMA format where participants can ask questions, observe, or be asked questions. Emphasis on the open, free-for-all approach in the Ergo spirit.

topics.title: Korean Blockchain Week Conference Plans
topics.summary: Kushti discusses upcoming presentation at Korean Blockchain Week, described as one of the biggest blockchain events globally. Expresses skepticism about large conferences being mostly commercial rather than technical.

topics.title: Sub-blocks Peer-to-Peer Layer Development
topics.summary: Kushti reports on sub-blocks development with heavily reworked peer-to-peer layer using INV messages and improved mempool handling. Currently testing with three peers and addressing messaging penalties and spam protection.

topics.title: Git Circles Community Currency Project
topics.summary: Introduction of Git Circles project for creating community currencies that reward developers with tokens for code contributions. Discussion about when tokens are needed versus when they're not in digital economies.

topics.title: ChainCash Basis Rework and Off-chain Payments
topics.summary: Detailed discussion of ChainCash rework to support off-chain payments without on-chain creation first. Covers tracker-based system, silver-backed community currencies, and comparison to free banking systems with transparent collateralization.

topics.title: DIY Hardware Wallet Development
topics.summary: Discussion of Neetram's open source DIY hardware wallet project that can be assembled at home for security and cost benefits. Addresses privacy concerns with commercial hardware wallets like Ledger.

topics.title: MCP Servers and AI Development Tools
topics.summary: Discussion of MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers for AI-assisted development on Ergo. Kushti notes limitations for core development but sees potential for contract testing and application building.

topics.title: Infrastructure Expansion and Global Coverage
topics.summary: Announcement of three new infrastructure peers joining with machines shipping for Jemai, Satoshi, and Lucas. Request for more European, Middle Eastern, and Asian coverage for the Ergo InfraDAO.

topics.title: Rosen Bridge Runes Integration and Testing
topics.summary: Update on Rosen bridge development including runes integration, extensive testing phases, and potential Bitcoin color coins standard. Discussion of wrapping ERG and other assets as runes for Bitcoin Lightning compatibility.

topics.title: Colorado Meetup Planning and Project Demos
topics.summary: Discussion of upcoming Colorado meetup with planned MVP demonstrations and testnet launches. Coordination with speakers and logistics including potential Korean barbecue dinner.

topics.title: Developer Onboarding and Full-Stack Development
topics.summary: Community member Tyler discusses challenges connecting frontend to blockchain and plans for creating educational content. Discussion of DECO program, AI-assisted learning tools, and developer documentation needs.

topics.title: Cyberverse Game Shutdown and Rebuild
topics.summary: Announcement that Cyberverse game will shut down for 30 days for major rebuild by Hero and Pixel. Players advised to withdraw cyber tokens before shutdown.
